collectible.title: Franziska's Riding Crop
collectible.subtitle: A filly's favorite fashion of flogging fools
collectible.text: Franziska isn't allowed to take her bullwhip into the Inventory any more, so she takes her riding crop instead. This one isn't the one she had as a kid, but it's custom-made to her exacting specifications.
collectible.unlock: Win a game while playing against Franziska.
